overview.problemStatement: If G" role="presentation" style="position: relative;">GGG is a graph on n" role="presentation" style="position: relative;">nnn vertices which contains no complete graph or independent set on ≫log⁡n" role="presentation" style="position: relative;">≫logn≫log⁡n\gg \log n vertices then G" role="presentation" style="position: relative;">GGG contains an induced subgraph on ≫n" role="presentation" style="position: relative;">≫n≫n\gg n vertices which contains ≫n1/2" role="presentation" style="position: relative;">≫n1/2≫n1/2\gg n^{1/2} distinct degrees.
